text.div:
Tularemia (Tests for Francisella tularensis by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    33676-8 Francisella tularensis [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    33677-6 Francisella tularensis [Presence] in Isolate by Organism specific culture
    33678-4 Francisella tularensis Ag [Presence] in Isolate by Immunofluorescence
    33680-0 Francisella tularensis DNA [Presence] in Isolate by NAA with probe detection
    33682-6 Francisella tularensis [Presence] in Isolate by Cell wall fatty acid analysis
    33715-4 Francisella tularensis Ab [Presence] in Isolate by Slide agglutination
    53373-7 Francisella tularensis Ab [Presence] in Isolate
